item.title: July --- Quote of the Month: -----------------"Change your expectations to appreciation and the world changes instantly! --- One's destination is never a place but rather a New Way of Looking at things! "
Kodi Box Maintenance: Be sure to close out of all of your apps when they are not in use. Once a month, Unplug the power to your modem for 2 minutes and plug back in to minimize buffering issues.
------ Feel free to call or text us on our New Business number (704) 705-7033 with any questions.-------
